segments.text: Do you know much about computers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've just been reading an article about them.they ' ll be used for all sorts of things now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For accounting system and things like that , you mean ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but they are used for other things , too.Do you remember when we went to buy a ticket for the flight to Paris .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The man asked where we want to go , then he type out the information on the form and waited for a reply . A few moment later , he gave us two tickets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , his machine must have been connected to a computer .
segments.speaker: S2
